statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ImageType , AA.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TBrandImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ImageType , AA.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TBrandImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBrandImage ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, BrandID, ImageType, ImageUrl ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #BrandID#, #ImageType#, #ImageUrl# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBrandImage SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ImageType = #ImageType# , ImageUrl = #ImageUrl# WHERE ID = #ID#
